src:
Đoković: Jedan od najboljih mečeva ove godine
01 Nov 2019, 19:13 by Darko
Novak Đoković je bio zadovoljan posle ubedljive pobede nad Stefanosom Cicipasom u četvrtfinalu Mastersa u Parizu.
– Zaista sam se dobro pripremo. Drugi set u prethodnom meču sam završio sa puno samouverenosti i to sam zadržao i u ovom suseretu. Ovo je bio jedan od najboljih mečeva koji sam odigrao ove godine – rekao je Đoković posle meča, prenose „Novosti“.
Novak će u subotu u polufinalu igrati sa Bugarinom Grigorom Dimitorovim koji je bio bolji od Čileanca Kristijana Garina rezultatom 6:2, 7:5.
– Biće to, naravno, težak meč. Igra odlično od US Opena. Imam mnogo poštovanja prema njemu. Ima mnogo talenta, može da igra agresivno i brzo. Ali, imam puno samopouzdzanja – poručio je Đoković.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Djokovic: One of the best matches this year
01 Nov 2019, 18:13 by Darko
Novak Djokovic was pleased after a convincing win over Stefanos Cicipas in the Masters quarterfinals in Paris.
- I'm really well prepared. I finished the second set in the previous match with a lot of confidence and I kept that in this match. This was one of the best matches I played this year - Djokovic said after the match, Novosti reports.
Novak will play with Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov in the semifinals on Saturday, who was better than Chilean Christian Garin with a score of 6: 2, 7: 5.
- It'll be a tough match, of course. Plays great from the US Open. I have a lot of respect for him. He has a lot of talent, he can play aggressively and quickly. But, I have a lot of confidence - said Djokovic.
